headline: A Look At Packaging Corporation Of America (PKG) Valuation After Earnings Miss And Softer 2026 Guidance
summary: Packaging Corporation of America (PKG) has put fresh numbers on the table, reporting weaker than expected fourth quarter 2025 results and issuing first quarter 2026 earnings guidance of US$2.20 per share. See our latest analysis for Packaging Corporation of America. Despite the weaker quarter and softer guidance, the share price is still at US$217.61, with a 30 day share price return of 4.23% and a 90 day share price return of 10.94%. headline: IP Earnings Miss Estimates in Q4, Sales Beat and Rise Y/Y
summary: International Paper posts a Q4 adjusted loss, misses estimates and unveils plans to split its packaging units, even as sales jump 53% and margins improve.

raw.headline: IP Earnings Miss Estimates in Q4, Sales Beat and Rise Y/Y

headline: Packaging Corporation of America Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Packaging Corporation of America (NYSE:PKG) reported fourth-quarter 2025 net income of $102 million, or $1.13 per share, and said results included significant special items tied to restructuring, acquisition-related costs, and facility closures. headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks That Concern Us
summary: When Wall Street turns bearish on a stock, it’s worth paying attention. These calls stand out because analysts rarely issue grim ratings on companies for fear their firms will lose out in other business lines such as M&A advisory.

raw.headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks That Concern Us
